data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Choiseul, Saint Lucia need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Choiseul, Saint Lucia
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, defend those who are loyal to your Word in the state of Choiseul, even against fierce enemies.
data.verse: Though the wicked bind me with ropes, I will not forget your law.

data.prayer: Father, we rejoice that you who began a good work in the church of Choiseul, Saint Lucia will carry it on to completion until the day of Jesus Christ!
data.verse: being confident of this, that he who began a good work in you will carry it on to completion until the day of Christ Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, make the church in Choiseul, Saint Lucia humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Choiseul
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Choiseul, Choiseul, Saint Lucia.
Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the state of Choiseul, Saint Lucia. Please, stir the 1,114 believers here to pray for awakening.
Spirit, help the church in the state of Choiseul to exponentially multiply disciples.

data.section_summary:
the state of Choiseul, Saint Lucia has a population of 6,100.

We estimate Choiseul has 1,114 people who might know Jesus, 4,676 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 311 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 5 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Choiseul to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.
